meanings.definition: The presence of pus in a bodily fluid or tissue.
meanings.sent1: The doctor was concerned about the purulence in the wound.
meanings.sent2: The purulence in the infected cut needed to be drained to promote healing.
meanings.sent3: The purulence in the wound looked like a tiny volcano erupting with pus.
meanings.sent4: The purulence in the wound was a grim reminder of the body's battle against infection.
meanings.sent5: The purulence oozing from the wound was a disgusting sight.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being purulent.
meanings.sent1: The nurse noted the purulence of the infected area.
meanings.sent2: The purulence of the wound indicated a serious infection.
meanings.sent3: Despite its purulence, the wound seemed to be healing well.
meanings.sent4: The purulence of the situation made everyone realize the severity of the issue.
